42 // IPM Calibration Configurations
43 #define ROBOT_POSITION_PIXEL_X 453
44 #define ROBOT_OFFSET_PIXEL_Y 76
45 #define METER_PER_PIXEL_X 0.0038f
46 #define METER_PER_PIXEL_Y 0.005f
47 
48 // Waypointing Configurations
49 #define WINDOW_SIZE 10
50 #define PEAK_MIN_DISTANCE 100
51 #define MIN_LANE_POINT_PAIRS 3
52 #define LANE_WIDTH_PIXELS 240
53 
54 // Model Predictive Control Parameters
55 #define MPC_WEIGHT_PHI 0.0f
56 #define U_LOWERBOUND (-3.1415f * 21 / 180)
57 #define U_UPPERBOUND (3.1415f * 21 / 180)
58 #define MAX_DELTA_U 0.1f
59 
60 // MPC Model Definitions
61 #define MODEL_PARAM_L_H 0.13f
62 #define MODEL_PARAM_L 0.26f
63 #define N_STATES 2
64 #define N_INPUTS 1
65 
66 #define STOP_SIGNAL -1024

68 namespace mpc {
69  MPCController::MPCController() {
70  // Define IPM transformation
71  vector<Point2f> origPoints;
72  origPoints.push_back(Point2f(0, 405));
73  origPoints.push_back(Point2f(960, 405));
74  origPoints.push_back(Point2f(960, 0));
75  origPoints.push_back(Point2f(0, 0));
76  vector<Point2f> dstPoints;
77  dstPoints.push_back(Point2f(395, 405));
78  dstPoints.push_back(Point2f(565, 405));
79  dstPoints.push_back(Point2f(960, 0));
80  dstPoints.push_back(Point2f(0, 0));
81  ipm = new IPM(Size(960, 405), Size(960, 405), origPoints, dstPoints);
82  }
83 
84  MPCController::~MPCController() {
85  delete ipm;
86  }
87 
88  bool MPCController::update(float deltaTime) {
89  // Update driving lane target
90  drivingLane = drivingLane + min(deltaTime/2, 0.2f) * (targetDrivingLane - drivingLane);
91 
92  currTimeSinceInput += deltaTime;
93  if (currTimeSinceInput > mpcTimestep) {
94  currTimeSinceInput -= mpcTimestep;
95  return true;
96  }
97  return false;
98  }
99 
100  int MPCController::getNextSteeringControl() {
101  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lck (u_mutex);
102 
103  if (!u_queue.empty()) {
104  double phi_L = u_queue.front();
105  u_queue.pop();
106  int u_steering = round(1000 * phi_L / U_UPPERBOUND);
107  u_steering = max(-1000, min(1000, u_steering));
108  return u_steering;
109  }
110 
111  return 0;
112  }
113 
114  int MPCController::getNextMotorControl() {
115  // If we are stopping right now, wait until the stopping time has passed
116  double currTime = ros::Time::now().toSec();
117  if (currTime < lastStopTime + 3) {
118  return 0;
119  }
120 
121  // Continue driving if next control steps exist
122  if (!u_queue.empty() && u_queue.front() != STOP_SIGNAL) {
123  return targetVelocity != 0 ? 100 + 444 * targetVelocity : 0;
124  }
125 
126  return 0;
127  }

129  void MPCController::reconfigureParameters(pses_control_test::ParamsConfig &config, uint32_t level)
130  {
131  showDebugOutputs = config.debug_output;
132 
133  mpcUseDeadtimeCompensation = config.mpc_deadtime_comp;
134  mpcTimestep = config.mpc_timestep;
135  mpcNumberTimesteps = config.mpc_number_timesteps;
136  mpcRecalcInterval = config.mpc_update_rate;
137  mpcWeightY = config.mpc_weight_state;
138  mpcWeightInput = config.mpc_weight_ctrl;
139 
140  detectionEndOffsetY = config.detection_end_offset;
141 
142  targetDrivingLane = config.ctrl_lane;
143  targetVelocity = config.ctrl_velocity;
144 
145  useDirectTrajectory = config.direct_trajectory;
146  directTrajectoryDiscount = config.direct_trajectory_discount;
147  fillPinkLane = config.fill_pink_lane;
148  }

150  // Detect left or right turn
151  bool MPCController::isLeftTurn(std::vector<Point>& leftmostPoints, std::vector<Point>& rightmostPoints) {
152  int leftSteps = 0;
153  int rightSteps = 0;
154 
155  for (int i = 0; i + 1 < rightmostPoints.size(); i++) {
156  if (rightmostPoints.at(i+1).x > rightmostPoints.at(i).x) {
157  rightSteps++;
158  } else {
159  leftSteps++;
160  }
161  }
162 
163  for (int i = 0; i + 1 < leftmostPoints.size(); i++) {
164  if (leftmostPoints.at(i+1).x > leftmostPoints.at(i).x) {
165  rightSteps++;
166  } else {
167  leftSteps++;
168  }
169  }
170 
171  return leftSteps > rightSteps;
172  }
173 
174  // Detect Histogram peak closest to the center of the image or -1 if none found
175  int MPCController::findBestHistogramPeakX(cv::Mat& histogram) {
176  int curMaxVal = 0, curMaxIndex = -1;
177  for (int i = 0; i < histogram.cols; i++) {
178  if (histogram.at<uchar>(0,i) < 127)
179  continue;
180 
181  if (histogram.at<uchar>(0,i) > curMaxVal) {
182  curMaxVal = histogram.at<uchar>(0,i);
183  curMaxIndex = i;
184  }
185  else if (histogram.at<uchar>(0,i) == curMaxVal) {
186  if (abs(i - histogram.cols / 2) < abs(curMaxIndex - histogram.cols / 2)) {
187  curMaxIndex = i;
188  }
189  }
190  }
191  return curMaxIndex;
192  }
193 
194  int MPCController::getWaypointXFromRightLanePoint(const Point& lanePoint) {
195  return lanePoint.x - round((3 - drivingLane) * LANE_WIDTH_PIXELS/4);
196  }
197 
198  int MPCController::getWaypointXFromLeftLanePoint(const Point& lanePoint) {
199  return lanePoint.x + round((1 + drivingLane) * LANE_WIDTH_PIXELS/4);
200  }
201 
202  int MPCController::getWaypointXFromMiddleLanePoint(const Point& lanePoint) {
203  return lanePoint.x + round((-1 + drivingLane) * LANE_WIDTH_PIXELS/4);
204  }
205 
206  int MPCController::getWaypointXFromOuterLanePoints(const Point& leftLanePoint,
207  const Point& rightLanePoint) {
208  return round((leftLanePoint.x * (3 - drivingLane) + rightLanePoint.x * (1 + drivingLane)) / 4);
209  }
210 
211  Point MPCController::getWaypointXFromLanePoints(const Point& leftLanePoint,
212  const Point& middleLanePoint, const Point& rightLanePoint) {
213  // If the middle point and the point on the driving side exists, place inbetween
214  if (drivingLane < 1 && middleLanePoint.x != -1 && leftLanePoint.x != -1) {
215  return Point(round(middleLanePoint.x * (0.5f + drivingLane/2) + leftLanePoint.x * (0.5f - drivingLane/2)), middleLanePoint.y);
216  } else if (drivingLane >= 1 && middleLanePoint.x != -1 && rightLanePoint.x != -1) {
217  return Point(round(middleLanePoint.x * (1.5f - drivingLane/2) + rightLanePoint.x * (-0.5f + drivingLane/2)), middleLanePoint.y);
218  } else if (middleLanePoint.x == -1) {
219  return Point(getWaypointXFromOuterLanePoints(leftLanePoint, rightLanePoint), middleLanePoint.y);
220  } else {
221  return Point(getWaypointXFromMiddleLanePoint(middleLanePoint), middleLanePoint.y);
222  }
223  }
224 
225  void MPCController::processAndTransformImage(const sensor_msgs::ImageConstPtr& msg,
226  cv::Mat& transformedImage) {
227  // Read image
228  cv::Mat image = cv_bridge::toCvShare(msg, "bgr8")->image;
229  int width = image.cols, height = image.rows;
230 
231  // Crop image
232  cv::Rect myROI(0, height / 4, width, height / 4 * 3);
233  cv::Mat croppedImage = image(myROI);
234  height = height / 4 * 3;
235 
236  // Lowpass-filter image
237  cv::Mat blurredImage;
238  cv::medianBlur(croppedImage, blurredImage, 3);
239 
240  // Convert image into HSV color space
241  cv::Mat HSVImage;
242  cvtColor(blurredImage, HSVImage, CV_BGR2HSV);
243 
244  // IPM-transform image
245  ipm->applyHomography(HSVImage, transformedImage);
246  }
247 
248  void MPCController::findLanePoints(const cv::Mat& transformedImage, const cv::Mat& ThreshImageGreen,
249  const cv::Mat& ThreshImagePink, std::vector<std::tuple<Point, Point, Point> >& detectedLanePoints) {
250  for (int window = 1; window <= transformedImage.rows / WINDOW_SIZE - detectionEndOffsetY / WINDOW_SIZE; window++) {
251  // Calculate column histogram for window
252  cv::Rect roi(0, transformedImage.rows - window * WINDOW_SIZE, transformedImage.cols, WINDOW_SIZE);
253  cv::Mat windowedImageGreen = ThreshImageGreen(roi);
254  cv::Mat windowedImagePink = ThreshImagePink(roi);
255  cv::Mat histogramGreen, histogramPink;
256  cv::reduce(windowedImageGreen, histogramGreen, 0, CV_REDUCE_AVG);
257  cv::reduce(windowedImagePink, histogramPink, 0, CV_REDUCE_AVG);
258 
259  // Find good peaks for green (2)
260  int firstPeakX = findBestHistogramPeakX(histogramGreen);
261 
262  // Blacken region around found peak
263  cv::circle(histogramGreen, Point(firstPeakX, 0), PEAK_MIN_DISTANCE, cv::Scalar(0), CV_FILLED, 8, 0);
264  int secondPeakX = findBestHistogramPeakX(histogramGreen);
265 
266  // Order green peaks
267  int leftPeakX = firstPeakX < secondPeakX ? firstPeakX : secondPeakX;
268  int rightPeakX = firstPeakX < secondPeakX ? secondPeakX : firstPeakX;
269 
270  // Find good peak for pink (1)
271  int pinkPeakX = findBestHistogramPeakX(histogramPink);
272 
273  // DEBUG visualization of histogram maxima
274  cv::circle(transformedImage, Point(leftPeakX, transformedImage.rows - window * WINDOW_SIZE + WINDOW_SIZE / 2), 3,
275  cv::Scalar(0, 255, 0), 1, 8, 0);
276  cv::circle(transformedImage, Point(rightPeakX, transformedImage.rows - window * WINDOW_SIZE + WINDOW_SIZE / 2), 3,
277  cv::Scalar(0, 255, 0), 1, 8, 0);
278  cv::circle(transformedImage, Point(pinkPeakX, transformedImage.rows - window * WINDOW_SIZE + WINDOW_SIZE / 2), 3,
279  cv::Scalar(0, 255, 0), 1, 8, 0);
280 
281  // Save points
282  auto points = std::make_tuple(Point(leftPeakX, transformedImage.rows - window * WINDOW_SIZE + WINDOW_SIZE / 2),
283  Point(pinkPeakX, transformedImage.rows - window * WINDOW_SIZE + WINDOW_SIZE / 2),
284  Point(rightPeakX, transformedImage.rows - window * WINDOW_SIZE + WINDOW_SIZE / 2));
285  detectedLanePoints.push_back(points);
286  }
287  }
288 
289  void MPCController::fillPinkLine(const cv::Mat& transformedImage,
290  std::vector<std::tuple<Point, Point, Point> >& detectedLanePoints) {
291  // Fill in between pink points
292  Point lastPink = Point(-1, -1);
293  for (int i = detectedLanePoints.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
294  Point currPink = std::get<1>(detectedLanePoints.at(i));
295  if (currPink.x != -1) {
296  if (lastPink.x != -1) {
297  cv::line(transformedImage, lastPink, currPink, cv::Scalar(165, 150, 255), 7);
298  }
299  lastPink = currPink;
300  }
301  }
302 
303  // Continue line backwards
304  Point bestPrevLastPink = Point(-1, -1);
305  for (int i = detectedLanePoints.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
306  Point currPink = std::get<1>(detectedLanePoints.at(i));
307  if (currPink.x != -1 && currPink.y != lastPink.y && currPink.y + 80 > lastPink.y) {
308  bestPrevLastPink = currPink;
309  break;
310  }
311  }
312  if (lastPink.x != -1 && bestPrevLastPink.x != -1) {
313  Point delta = lastPink - bestPrevLastPink;
314  int deltaStepsUntilOutOfBounds = (transformedImage.rows + ROBOT_OFFSET_PIXEL_Y - lastPink.y - 1) / delta.y;
315  //ROS_INFO("test %d %d %d %d %d", deltaStepsUntilOutOfBounds, delta.x, delta.y, bestPrevLastPink.x, bestPrevLastPink.y);
316  Point drawEndPoint = Point(lastPink.x + delta.x * deltaStepsUntilOutOfBounds,
317  lastPink.y + delta.y * deltaStepsUntilOutOfBounds);
318  cv::line(transformedImage, lastPink, drawEndPoint, cv::Scalar(165, 150, 255), 7);
319  }
320  }
321 
322  void MPCController::sortLanePoints(std::vector<std::tuple<Point, Point, Point> > detectedLanePoints,
323  std::vector<std::tuple<Point, Point, Point> >& usefulPoints, std::vector<Point>& rightmostPoints,
324  std::vector<Point>& leftmostPoints) {
325  // Select interesting tuples
326  for (int i = 0; i < detectedLanePoints.size(); i++) {
327  // If middle point exists, this point is interesting
328  if (std::get<1>(detectedLanePoints.at(i)).x != -1)
329  usefulPoints.push_back(detectedLanePoints.at(i));
330  else
331  // Otherwise, the other two lane points must exist to be interesting
332  if (std::get<0>(detectedLanePoints.at(i)).x != -1 && std::get<2>(detectedLanePoints.at(i)).x != -1)
333  usefulPoints.push_back(detectedLanePoints.at(i));
334  }
335  // Select rightmost points
336  for (int i = 0; i < detectedLanePoints.size(); i++) {
337  if (std::get<2>(detectedLanePoints.at(i)).x != -1) {
338  // If second point detected, use second point
339  rightmostPoints.push_back(std::get<2>(detectedLanePoints.at(i)));
340  } else if (std::get<0>(detectedLanePoints.at(i)).x != -1) {
341  // If no second point but first point detected, use first point
342  rightmostPoints.push_back(std::get<0>(detectedLanePoints.at(i)));
343  }
344  }
345  // Select leftmost points
346  for (int i = 0; i < detectedLanePoints.size(); i++) {
347  if (std::get<0>(detectedLanePoints.at(i)).x == -1 && std::get<2>(detectedLanePoints.at(i)).x != -1) {
348  // If second point detected and no first point detected, use second point
349  leftmostPoints.push_back(std::get<2>(detectedLanePoints.at(i)));
350  } else if (std::get<0>(detectedLanePoints.at(i)).x != -1 && std::get<2>(detectedLanePoints.at(i)).x != -1) {
351  // If second point detected and first point detected, use first point
352  leftmostPoints.push_back(std::get<0>(detectedLanePoints.at(i)));
353  }
354  }
355  }
356 
357  void MPCController::generateWaypoints(const cv::Mat& transformedImage, std::vector<Point> rightmostPoints,
358  std::vector<Point> leftmostPoints, std::vector<std::tuple<Point, Point, Point> > usefulPointTuples,
359  std::vector<Point>& wayPoints) {
360  if (usefulPointTuples.size() >= MIN_LANE_POINT_PAIRS) {
361  std::vector<Point> usefulWaypoints;
362 
363  // Sufficient useful horizontal tuples -> place waypoints relative to existing tuples
364  for (int i = 0; i < usefulPointTuples.size(); i++) {
365  // The useful left/right points are not necessarily on the left/right lane
366  Point middleLanePoint = std::get<1>(usefulPointTuples.at(i));
367  Point leftLanePoint(-1, -1);
368  Point rightLanePoint(-1, -1);
369 
370  if (std::get<0>(usefulPointTuples.at(i)).x == -1 && std::get<2>(usefulPointTuples.at(i)).x != -1) {
371  // If there is only one sidelane point, it is placed in relation to the existing middle point
372  if (std::get<2>(usefulPointTuples.at(i)).x > middleLanePoint.x)
373  rightLanePoint = std::get<2>(usefulPointTuples.at(i));
374  else
375  leftLanePoint = std::get<2>(usefulPointTuples.at(i));
376  } else {
377  // Else take the detected points
378  leftLanePoint = std::get<0>(usefulPointTuples.at(i));
379  rightLanePoint = std::get<2>(usefulPointTuples.at(i));
380  }
381 
382  Point wayPoint = getWaypointXFromLanePoints(leftLanePoint, middleLanePoint, rightLanePoint);
383  usefulWaypoints.push_back(wayPoint);
384  }
385 
386  // Waypoint post-processing: Infer more waypoints from left/right points
387  int leftmostIndex = 0;
388  int rightmostIndex = 0;
389  int usefulIndex = 0;
390 
391  // Get average x of useful waypoints
392  int avgWaypointX = 0;
393  for (int i = 0; i < usefulWaypoints.size(); i++)
394  avgWaypointX += usefulWaypoints.at(i).x;
395  avgWaypointX /= usefulWaypoints.size();
396 
397  // Now build the actual waypoints:
398  for (int window = 1; window <= transformedImage.rows / WINDOW_SIZE - detectionEndOffsetY / WINDOW_SIZE; window++) {
399  // The current point height of this window is given by the following
400  int currHeight = transformedImage.rows - window * WINDOW_SIZE + WINDOW_SIZE / 2;
401 
402  // Cycle through points until at the correct height
403  while (usefulIndex < usefulWaypoints.size() && usefulWaypoints.at(usefulIndex).y > currHeight) {
404  usefulIndex++;
405  }
406  while (rightmostIndex < rightmostPoints.size() && rightmostPoints.at(rightmostIndex).y > currHeight) {
407  rightmostIndex++;
408  }
409 
410  // If a useful point exists for this window, use the useful point and increment pointer
411  if (usefulIndex < usefulWaypoints.size() && usefulWaypoints.at(usefulIndex).y == currHeight) {
412  wayPoints.push_back(usefulWaypoints.at(usefulIndex));
413  } else
414 
415  // Otherwise, the rightmost point could be used to infer from
416  if (rightmostIndex < rightmostPoints.size() && rightmostPoints.at(rightmostIndex).y == currHeight) {
417  // Treat it as the right lane point if it is right of the average x of the useful waypoints
418  if (rightmostPoints.at(rightmostIndex).x > avgWaypointX + 40) {
419  Point lanePoint = rightmostPoints.at(rightmostIndex);
420  Point wayPoint(std::max(0, getWaypointXFromRightLanePoint(lanePoint)), lanePoint.y);
421  wayPoints.push_back(wayPoint);
422  } else
423  // Otherwise it is the left lane point
424  if (rightmostPoints.at(rightmostIndex).x < avgWaypointX - 40) {
425  Point lanePoint = rightmostPoints.at(rightmostIndex);
426  Point wayPoint(std::min(transformedImage.cols, getWaypointXFromLeftLanePoint(lanePoint)), lanePoint.y);
427  wayPoints.push_back(wayPoint);
428  }
429  }
430  }
431  } else if (isLeftTurn(leftmostPoints, rightmostPoints)) {
432  // If we do not have enough useful point pairs, we fallback to detecting leftward/rightward
433  // Left turn fallback -> drive left from rightmost points
434  for (int i = 0; i < rightmostPoints.size(); i++) {
435  Point lanePoint = rightmostPoints.at(i);
436  Point wayPoint(std::max(0, getWaypointXFromRightLanePoint(lanePoint)), lanePoint.y);
437  wayPoints.push_back(wayPoint);
438  }
439  } else {
440  // Right turn fallback -> drive right from leftmost points
441  for (int i = 0; i < leftmostPoints.size(); i++) {
442  Point lanePoint = leftmostPoints.at(i);
443  Point wayPoint(std::min(transformedImage.cols, getWaypointXFromLeftLanePoint(lanePoint)), lanePoint.y);
444  wayPoints.push_back(wayPoint);
445  }
446  }
447  }
448 
449  void MPCController::fitTrajectoryToWaypoints(const cv::Mat& transformedImage, std::vector<Point>& wayPoints,
450  std::vector<double>& trajectory_coeffs) {
451  // Fit a polynomial x(y) as nominal trajectory
452  std::vector<double> xs;
453  std::vector<double> ys;
454 
455  if (useDirectTrajectory) {
456  // Linear polynomial from robot position to waypoint
457  xs.push_back(ROBOT_POSITION_PIXEL_X);
458  ys.push_back(transformedImage.rows + ROBOT_OFFSET_PIXEL_Y);
459  xs.push_back((1 - directTrajectoryDiscount) * wayPoints.at(0).x + directTrajectoryDiscount * ROBOT_POSITION_PIXEL_X);
460  ys.push_back(wayPoints.at(0).y);
461  polyfit(ys, xs, trajectory_coeffs, 1);
462  } else {
463  // Quadratic polynomial:
464  if (INTERPOLATE_WITH_CURRENT_POSITION) {
465  xs.push_back(ROBOT_POSITION_PIXEL_X);
466  ys.push_back(transformedImage.rows + ROBOT_OFFSET_PIXEL_Y);
467  }
468  for (int i = 0; i < wayPoints.size(); i++) {
469  xs.push_back(wayPoints.at(i).x);
470  ys.push_back(wayPoints.at(i).y);
471  }
472  polyfit(ys, xs, trajectory_coeffs, 2);
473  }
474  }
475 
476  void MPCController::solveMPCProblem(const cv::Mat& transformedImage, const std::vector<double>& trajectory_coeffs, clock_t begin,
477  std::queue<double> prev_u_queue, const cv::Mat& transformedFullImage, quadprogpp::Vector<double>& optimal_u) {
478  int N_QUADPROG_VARS = (N_INPUTS * mpcNumberTimesteps);
479 
480  // Calculate MPC solution from trajectory and state
481  // Initialize linear discrete system
482  quadprogpp::Matrix<double> A_d, B_d, C_d;
483  A_d.resize(2, 2);
484  B_d.resize(2, 1);
485  C_d.resize(1, 2);
486 
487  A_d[0][0] = 1;
488  A_d[0][1] = targetVelocity * mpcTimestep;
489  A_d[1][0] = 0;
490  A_d[1][1] = 1;
491  B_d[0][0] = ((targetVelocity * mpcTimestep) * (MODEL_PARAM_L_H + (targetVelocity * mpcTimestep) / 2)) / MODEL_PARAM_L;
492  B_d[1][0] = (targetVelocity * mpcTimestep) / MODEL_PARAM_L;
493  C_d[0][0] = 1;
494  C_d[0][1] = 0;
495 
496  // Initialize problem weights
497  quadprogpp::Matrix<double> Q;
498  double P = mpcWeightInput;
499  Q.resize(0, N_STATES, N_STATES);
500 
501  Q[0][0] = mpcWeightY;
502  Q[0][1] = 0;
503  Q[1][0] = 0;
504  Q[1][1] = MPC_WEIGHT_PHI;
505 
506  // Initialize reference trajectory via kinematic model
507  quadprogpp::Matrix<double> x_ref;
508  x_ref.resize(N_STATES * mpcNumberTimesteps, 1);
509  double y_pixel = transformedImage.rows + ROBOT_OFFSET_PIXEL_Y;
510  for (int i = 0; i < mpcNumberTimesteps; i++) {
511  y_pixel -= targetVelocity * mpcTimestep / METER_PER_PIXEL_Y;
512  double x_ref_pixel = polyeval(trajectory_coeffs, y_pixel);
513  double x_ref_meters = (x_ref_pixel - ROBOT_POSITION_PIXEL_X) * METER_PER_PIXEL_X;
514  x_ref[2 * i][0] = x_ref_meters;
515  x_ref[2 * i + 1][0] = 0; // unneeded since unweighted
516  }
517 
518  // Initialize quadratic programming problem
519  quadprogpp::Matrix<double> B_dash;
520  quadprogpp::Vector<double> oddRow;
521  quadprogpp::Vector<double> evenRow;
522  B_dash.resize(0, N_STATES * mpcNumberTimesteps, N_INPUTS * mpcNumberTimesteps);
523  oddRow.resize(0, N_INPUTS * mpcNumberTimesteps);
524  evenRow.resize(0, N_INPUTS * mpcNumberTimesteps);
525 
526  oddRow[0] = B_d[0][0];
527  evenRow[0] = B_d[1][0];
528  for (int row = 0; row < mpcNumberTimesteps; row++) {
529  // calculate 2 rows of B_dash each iteration
530  for (int col = oddRow.size() - 1; col > 0; col--) {
531  oddRow[col] = oddRow[col - 1];
532  evenRow[col] = evenRow[col - 1];
533  }
534  oddRow[0] = A_d[0][0] * oddRow[1] + A_d[0][1] * evenRow[1];
535  evenRow[0] = A_d[1][0] * oddRow[1] + A_d[1][1] * evenRow[1];
536  for (int col = 0; col < oddRow.size(); col++) {
537  B_dash[2 * row][col] = oddRow[col];
538  B_dash[2 * row + 1][col] = evenRow[col];
539  }
540  }
541 
542  quadprogpp::Matrix<double> Q_dash;
543  Q_dash.resize(0, N_STATES * mpcNumberTimesteps, N_STATES * mpcNumberTimesteps);
544  for (int row = 0; row < mpcNumberTimesteps; row++) {
545  Q_dash[2 * row][2 * row] = Q[0][0];
546  Q_dash[2 * row][2 * row + 1] = Q[0][1];
547  Q_dash[2 * row + 1][2 * row] = Q[1][0];
548  Q_dash[2 * row + 1][2 * row + 1] = Q[1][1];
549  }
550 
551  quadprogpp::Matrix<double> P_dash;
552  P_dash.resize(0, N_INPUTS * mpcNumberTimesteps, N_INPUTS * mpcNumberTimesteps);
553  for (int row = 0; row < mpcNumberTimesteps; row++) {
554  P_dash[row][row] = P;
555  }
556 
557  // Get initial state
558  quadprogpp::Matrix<double> x0;
559  x0.resize(0, N_STATES, 1);
560  x0[0][0] = 0;
561  x0[1][0] = 0;
562 
563  // Perform deadtime compensation
564  int compensation_steps = round(double(clock() - begin) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC / mpcTimestep);
565  if (mpcUseDeadtimeCompensation) {
566  for (int i = 0; i < compensation_steps; i++) {
567  if (prev_u_queue.empty())
568  break;
569  x0 = A_d * x0 + B_d * prev_u_queue.front();
570  prev_u_queue.pop();
571  }
572  }
573 
574  // Calculate variables for quadratic program
575  quadprogpp::Matrix<double> A_dash;
576  A_dash.resize(N_STATES * mpcNumberTimesteps, N_STATES);
577  quadprogpp::Matrix<double> _tmpMat = A_d;
578  for (int i = 0; i < mpcNumberTimesteps; i++) {
579  A_dash[2 * i][0] = _tmpMat[0][0];
580  A_dash[2 * i][1] = _tmpMat[0][1];
581  A_dash[2 * i + 1][0] = _tmpMat[1][0];
582  A_dash[2 * i + 1][1] = _tmpMat[1][1];
583  _tmpMat = _tmpMat * A_d;
584  }
585 
586  quadprogpp::Matrix<double> chi0 = A_dash * x0 - x_ref;
587  quadprogpp::Matrix<double> G = transpose(B_dash) * Q_dash * B_dash + P_dash;
588  quadprogpp::Vector<double> g0 = (transpose(chi0) * Q_dash * B_dash).extractRow(0);
589  quadprogpp::Matrix<double> CE, CI;
590  CE.resize(0, N_QUADPROG_VARS, 0);
591  CI.resize(0, N_QUADPROG_VARS * 4, N_QUADPROG_VARS);
592  quadprogpp::Vector<double> ce0, ci0, x;
593  ce0.resize(0, 0);
594  ci0.resize(0, N_QUADPROG_VARS * 4);
595 
596  // inequality constraints on input (10, 11)
597  for (int i = 0; i < N_QUADPROG_VARS; i++) {
598  CI[i][i] = 1; //equation 10
599  CI[N_QUADPROG_VARS + i][i] = -1; //equation 11
600  }
601  for (int i = 0; i < N_QUADPROG_VARS; i++) {
602  ci0[i] = U_UPPERBOUND;
603  ci0[N_QUADPROG_VARS + i] = -U_LOWERBOUND;
604  }
605 
606  // other constraints (12, 13, 14, 15, 16, 17) are skipped
607  // Custom constraint: disallow too fast changing of control
608  for (int i = 0; i < N_QUADPROG_VARS - 1; i++) {
609  CI[N_QUADPROG_VARS * 2 + i][i] = 1;
610  CI[N_QUADPROG_VARS * 3 + i][i] = -1;
611 
612  CI[N_QUADPROG_VARS * 2 + i][i + 1] = -1;
613  CI[N_QUADPROG_VARS * 3 + i][i + 1] = 1;
614  }
615  CI[N_QUADPROG_VARS * 3 - 1][0] = 1;
616  CI[N_QUADPROG_VARS * 4 - 1][0] = -1;
617  for (int i = 0; i < N_QUADPROG_VARS - 1; i++) {
618  ci0[N_QUADPROG_VARS * 2 + i] = MAX_DELTA_U;
619  ci0[N_QUADPROG_VARS * 3 + i] = MAX_DELTA_U;
620  }
621  if (!prev_u_queue.empty() && prev_u_queue.front() != STOP_SIGNAL) {
622  ci0[N_QUADPROG_VARS * 3 - 1] = -prev_u_queue.front() + MAX_DELTA_U;
623  ci0[N_QUADPROG_VARS * 4 - 1] = prev_u_queue.front() + MAX_DELTA_U;
624  } else {
625  ci0[N_QUADPROG_VARS * 3 - 1] = MAX_DELTA_U;
626  ci0[N_QUADPROG_VARS * 4 - 1] = MAX_DELTA_U;
627  }
628 
629  // Solve control input via quadratic programming solver
630  CI = transpose(CI);
631  optimal_u.resize(N_QUADPROG_VARS);
632  solve_quadprog(G, g0, CE, ce0, CI, ci0, optimal_u);
633 
634  // Draw trajectory beginning from starting state
635  double predicted_y = transformedImage.rows + ROBOT_OFFSET_PIXEL_Y;
636  if (mpcUseDeadtimeCompensation)
637  predicted_y -= compensation_steps * targetVelocity * mpcTimestep / METER_PER_PIXEL_Y;
638 
639  // Fill in and draw trajectory + robot position
640  for (int y = predicted_y; y > 0; y--) {
641  int x = round(polyeval(trajectory_coeffs, y));
642  cv::circle(transformedFullImage, Point(x, y), 1, cv::Scalar(255, 0, 0), 1, 8, 0);
643  }
644  cv::circle(transformedFullImage, Point(ROBOT_POSITION_PIXEL_X, predicted_y), 8, cv::Scalar(255, 0, 0), 4, 8, 0);
645 
646  // Draw predicted MPC trajectory
647  quadprogpp::Matrix<double> predicted_state = x0;
648  for (int i = 0; i < mpcNumberTimesteps; i++) {
649  predicted_state = A_d * predicted_state + B_d * optimal_u[i];
650  predicted_y -= targetVelocity * mpcTimestep / METER_PER_PIXEL_Y;
651  double predicted_x = predicted_state[0][0] / METER_PER_PIXEL_X + ROBOT_POSITION_PIXEL_X;
652  cv::circle(transformedFullImage, Point(round(predicted_x), round(predicted_y)), 2, cv::Scalar(0, 0, 255), -1, 8, 0);
653  }
654  }
655 
656  void MPCController::processStopSign(const std_msgs::Int16ConstPtr& msg) {
657  double currTime = ros::Time::now().toSec();
658  if (currTime > lastStopTime + 10) {
659  double lastStopTime = currTime;
660  targetVelocity = 0;
661  }
662  }
663 
664  void MPCController::processLaneSign(const std_msgs::Int16ConstPtr& msg) {
665  double currTime = ros::Time::now().toSec();
666  if (currTime > lastLaneTime + 10) {
667  double lastLaneTime = currTime;
668  targetDrivingLane = 2 - targetDrivingLane;
669  }
670  }
671 
672  void MPCController::processSpeedSign(const std_msgs::Int16ConstPtr& msg) {
673  double currTime = ros::Time::now().toSec();
674  if (currTime > lastSpeedTime + 10) {
675  double lastSpeedTime = currTime;
676  targetVelocity = 0.3f;
677  }
678  }
679 
680  void MPCController::processImage(const sensor_msgs::ImageConstPtr& msg)
681  {
682  cv::Mat transformedImage;
683  cv::Mat ThreshImageGreen, ThreshImagePink;
684  std::vector<std::tuple<Point, Point, Point>> detectedLanePointTuples, usefulLanePointTuples;
685  std::vector<Point> rightmostPoints, leftmostPoints, wayPoints;
686  std::queue<double> prev_u_queue;
687  std::vector<double> trajectory_coeffs;
688  quadprogpp::Vector<double> optimal_u;
689 
690  clock_t begin = clock();
691  ROS_INFO("*** NEW IMAGE ***");
692 
693  // Only use frame if time interval since last calculation has passed
694  double currTime = ros::Time::now().toSec();
695  if (currTime <= timeLastMPCCalc + mpcRecalcInterval)
696  return;
697  else
698  timeLastMPCCalc = currTime;
699 
700  // Remember current control queue for deadtime compensation
701  {
702  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lck(u_mutex);
703  prev_u_queue = std::queue<double>(u_queue);
704  }
705 
706  // Transform image
707  processAndTransformImage(msg, transformedImage);
708  ROS_INFO("Processed image! t = %f", double(clock() - begin) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC);
709 
710  // Threshold the colors to find green and pink
711  inRange(transformedImage, cv::Scalar(50, 50, 120), cv::Scalar(70, 255, 255), ThreshImageGreen);
712  inRange(transformedImage, cv::Scalar(155, 50, 120), cv::Scalar(175, 255, 255), ThreshImagePink);
713  ROS_INFO("Thresholded image! t = %f", double(clock() - begin) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC);
714 
715  // Sliding window histogram peak search for lane points
716  findLanePoints(transformedImage, ThreshImageGreen, ThreshImagePink, detectedLanePointTuples);
717  ROS_INFO("Found lane points! t = %f", double(clock() - begin) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC);
718 
719  // Sort the detected lane points into leftmost, rightmost and useful points
720  sortLanePoints(detectedLanePointTuples, usefulLanePointTuples, rightmostPoints, leftmostPoints);
721  ROS_INFO("Sorted lane points! t = %f", double(clock() - begin) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC);
722 
723  // Optional: Fill-in pink lane
724  if (fillPinkLane)
725  fillPinkLine(transformedImage, detectedLanePointTuples);
726 
727  // Generate waypoints from detected lane points
728  generateWaypoints(transformedImage, rightmostPoints, leftmostPoints, usefulLanePointTuples, wayPoints);
729  ROS_INFO("Generated waypoints! t = %f", double(clock() - begin) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC);
730 
731  // If we could not find more than three wayPoints, we stop and do nothing
732  if (wayPoints.size() <= 3) {
733  ROS_INFO("Too few waypoints, skipping! t = %f", double(clock() - begin) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC);
734  std::queue<double> empty;
735  std::swap(u_queue, empty);
736  u_queue.push(STOP_SIGNAL);
737  return;
738  }
739 
740  // Fit a polynomial x(y) as nominal trajectory
741  fitTrajectoryToWaypoints(transformedImage, wayPoints, trajectory_coeffs);
742  ROS_INFO("Finished fitting trajectory! t = %f", double(clock() - begin) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC);
743 
744  // Initialize full debug image
745  cv::Rect helperROI(0, 0, transformedImage.cols, ROBOT_OFFSET_PIXEL_Y);
746  cv::Mat transformedOriginalImage, transformedFullImage;
747  cvtColor(transformedImage, transformedOriginalImage, CV_HSV2BGR);
748  cv::Mat bottomFill = transformedOriginalImage(helperROI).clone();
749  cv::rectangle(bottomFill, Point(0, 0), Point(transformedImage.cols, ROBOT_OFFSET_PIXEL_Y), cv::Scalar(0, 0, 0), -1);
750  cv::vconcat(transformedOriginalImage, bottomFill, transformedFullImage);
751 
752  // Calculate MPC solution from trajectory and state
753  solveMPCProblem(transformedImage, trajectory_coeffs, begin, prev_u_queue, transformedFullImage, optimal_u);
754 
755  // Set next control actions
756  {
757  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lck(u_mutex);
758  std::queue<double> empty;
759  std::swap(u_queue, empty);
760  for (int i = 0; i < (N_INPUTS * mpcNumberTimesteps); i++)
761  u_queue.push(optimal_u[i]);
762  }
763 
764  ROS_INFO("Finished MPC Optimization! t = %f, optimal_u(0) = %f", double(clock() - begin) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC, optimal_u[0]);
765 
766  if (showDebugOutputs) {
767  for (int i = 0; i < (N_INPUTS * mpcNumberTimesteps); i++)
768  ROS_INFO("optimal_u(%d) = %f", i, optimal_u[i]);
769 
770  // Visualization of waypoints
771  for (int i = 0; i < wayPoints.size(); i++) {
772  cv::circle(transformedFullImage, wayPoints.at(i), 10, cv::Scalar(0, 255, 0), 1, 8, 0);
773  }
774 
775  // Transform back into original image
776  cv::Mat fullImage;
777  ipm->applyHomographyInv(transformedFullImage, fullImage);
778 
779  // Show debug pictures
780  // cv::imshow("raw", image);
781  // cv::imshow("transformed", transformedImage);
782  // cv::imshow("thresholdedGreen", ThreshImageGreen);
783  // cv::imshow("thresholdedPink", ThreshImagePink);
784  cv::imshow("windowed", transformedFullImage);
785  cv::imshow("windowedOrig", fullImage);
786  ROS_INFO("Finished debug output! t = %f", double(clock() - begin) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC);
787 
788  cv::waitKey(1);
789  }
790  }
791 }
